From: "Wolf Gang" <WarBarge@...>

:: Wolfgang ::

:: Jumps up from the floor, shaken, but not stirred. ::

Accidents, aye?

:: Wolfgang finnaly realises that he is outgunned, and outnumbered. ::

Scum like you do not deserve to kill a grand warrior like me, so if you'd 
excuse me, i'll be leaving now.

:: Wolfgang attempts to start his artic afterburners, but nothing happens. 
He realises that theres only one way out. ::

Beastmode!

:: Transforms to a mighty artic wolf and starts running, heading towards a 
gap between the armed bots. ::
